title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 81.3 - Award of grant
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 81.3 - Award of grant

State Regulations

In evaluating the applications submitted pursuant to
section
81.1
of this Part, the commissioner
may consider the distribution of centers on a regional basis, so that access to
such centers is available on a wide geographical basis. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
81.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
